scripts.build: yarn run generate-local && graph build subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.build-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph build subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.build-release: yarn run generate-release && graph build subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.build-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph build subgraph.mumbai-staging.yaml
scripts.build-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph build subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.codegen: yarn run generate-local && graph codegen subgraph.local.yaml
scripts.codegen-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph codegen subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.codegen-release: yarn run generate-release && graph codegen subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.codegen-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph codegen subgraph.mumbai-staging.yaml
scripts.codegen-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph codegen subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: yarn run codegen && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-local subgraph.local.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-release: yarn run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release subgraph.local-release.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-staging subgraph.local-staging.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-local-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop subgraph.local-develop.yaml -l `jq '.version' package.json`
scripts.deploy-develop: yarn run generate-develop && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-develop --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.mumbai-develop.yaml
scripts.deploy-release: yarn run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.deploy-release2: yarn run generate-release && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-release2 --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.mumbai-release.yaml
scripts.deploy-staging: yarn run generate-staging && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-staging --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.mumbai-staging.yaml
scripts.deploy-staging2: yarn run generate-staging && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-mumbai-staging2 --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.mumbai-staging.yaml
scripts.deploy-polygon: yarn run generate-polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-polygon --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.polygon.yaml
scripts.deploy-polygon2: yarn run generate-polygon && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ startbahn/startrail-polygon2 --access-token "$TOKEN" subgraph.polygon.yaml
